titleStmt.title: Prelacie is miserie, or, The suppressing of prelaticall government and establishing of provintiall and nationall sinods is a hopefull meanes to make a flourishing church and a happie kingdome
titleStmt.author: Baillie, Robert, 1599-1662.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Robert Baillie by Wing.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Errors in paging: pages 9 and 10 misnumbered 5 and 4.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
